chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:
I would like to initiate a refund.
Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device was purchased as a GOOD condition. According to the Quality Charter, GOOD condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €40 deduction will be made once we have completed the diagnosis of the phone and confirm that there are no further issues with it. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile, 

Rejected. You know that you are not allowed to do this. You are welcome to contact the SSC.

I will send you a screenshot of the quality charter in which situations you can deduct money.

Please kindly refer to the Seller Support Centre (SSC) if you would like further clarification on this topic. You should easily find the answers to your questions there. Just click on this link and you will be taken to the home page of your help centre: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/login

Under "Top categories" select the category that fits your issue and an article has most likely already been written on this topic. If the help centre articles do not provide you the answers you were looking for, you can directly reach out to your SSC team by clicking on "Submit a new request" and you will receive an answer within 24 working hours. Click on this link to be redirected to the form: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/submit-new-request

You can monitor your requests by clicking on the tab "My existing requests".

*** Reminder: If this is the first time you go to the SSC, you must create a new account as this is a separate platform. You can use the same credentials as your Back Office, if you want, or different ones if you prefer.

We hope this helps!
Have a lovely day!

Seda from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

As mentioned above, the device was purchased as a GOOD condition. According to the Quality Charter, GOOD condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time, which suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €40 deduction will be made once we have completed the diagnosis of the phone and confirm that there are no further issues with it. Please check with the customer if this is a;right with them and kindly do not refund the customer in the meantime.

Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

As mentioned above, the device was purchased as a GOOD condition. According to the Quality Charter, GOOD condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time, which suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €40 deduction will be made once we have completed the diagnosis of the phone and confirm that there are no further issues with it. Please check with the customer if this is a;right with them and kindly do not refund the customer in the meantime.

Thank you.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile

According to the image you sent us, the discount is ONLY given when there are missing accessories. 

You can see the image attached. 

The customer is within 30 days and can return the device within that time for a refund. 

The customer should be refunded the full amount, according to our quality charter. 

I ask that you fulfil the refund deadline, otherwise we will do it for you. 

Regards,
Libania from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

As mentioned above, the device was purchased as a GOOD condition. According to the Quality Charter, GOOD condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time, which suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €40 deduction will be made once we have completed the diagnosis of the phone and confirm that there are no further issues with it. Please check with the customer if this is a;right with them and kindly do not refund the customer in the meantime.

Thank you.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile


You received this device for a refund on 21.05.2024.

We remind you that the processing time for those cases is 2 working days.

I will come back to this SAV on 27.05.2024. 

If you are unable to handle this device because of a warranty exclusion or a user account still activated, please let us know so that we can assist you. 

As a reminder, failure to do so will lead to a refund of the customer in accordance with our Quality charter.

Regards,
Libania from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

As mentioned above, the device was purchased in GOOD condition, which indicates that it is free of scratches according to the Quality Charter. As seen from the pictures above, the device has scratches upon return. 
The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time, which suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt. Now that the device has scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

In hopes of reaching an agreeable outcome, we are willing to lower the deduction to 30 euros which indicates that the customer receives a partial refund. Kindly confirm with the customer if this is agreeable.
Thank you.

Regards,
YR

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded €638.34 to the customer for not having met the deadlines. 

Kind regards, Libania from Back Market
